entry.title: Monday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
